mapper.insert: insert into product (name, brand, goodsMark, unitpPrice, minPrice, initialInventory, unit, commission, remark, auxiliaryWord, purchasingPrice, memberPrice, minDiscount, specification, integral, pastDueTime, imagePath, images) values (#{name}, #{brand}, #{goodsMark}, #{unitpPrice}, #{minPrice}, #{initialInventory}, #{unit}, #{commission}, #{remark}, #{auxiliaryWord}, #{purchasingPrice}, #{memberPrice}, #{minDiscount}, #{specification}, #{integral}, #{pastDueTime}, #{imagePath}, #{images})
mapper.update: update product set name = #{name}, brand = #{brand}, goodsMark = #{goodsMark}, unitpPrice = #{unitpPrice}, minPrice = #{minPrice}, initialInventory = #{initialInventory}, unit = #{unit}, commission = #{commission}, remark = #{remark}, auxiliaryWord = #{auxiliaryWord}, purchasingPrice = #{purchasingPrice}, memberPrice = #{memberPrice}, minDiscount = #{minDiscount}, specification = #{specification}, integral = #{integral}, pastDueTime = #{pastDueTime}, imagePath = #{imagePath} images = #{images} where id = #{id}
mapper.sql: select id, name, brand, goodsMark, unitpPrice, minPrice, initialInventory, unit, commission, remark, auxiliaryWord, purchasingPrice, memberPrice, minDiscount, specification, integral, pastDueTime, imagePath, images

where.if: and ( name like concat('%', #{keyword},'%') or brand like concat('%', #{keyword},'%') or unitpPrice like concat('%', #{keyword},'%') )

mapper.select: select * from product p join secondary s on p.id = s.product_id where s.product_id = #{id}
